name: Basement Lab
longDesc:
You are in the BASEMENT LAB.
A hatch leads up and out to the YARD. It is the only real exit.
If your parents find out you came down here you'll be grounded for months.
description:
You are in the BASEMENT LAB.
A hatch leads up and out to the YARD.

laundry chute.name: laundry chute
laundry chute.description:
The laundry chute opens up to a laundry basket.
You cannot climb up it, but you can slide down it if you know where the entrance is.

desk.name: desk
desk.description: The computer is on the desk, but you can't see it from here, you have to CLIMB DESK to look at it.

computer.name: computer
computer.description: The computer has a big, old-fashioned keyboard. You must ENTER PASSWORD to access this computer.

software.name: software
software.description: All the code you need to program the shrink ray to make things big again.
